mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_date, notice_vote, notice_title, notice_content, notice_hide, viewer_count, employee_no, notice_preno) VALUES (#{noticeDate}, #{noticeVote}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeHide}, #{viewerCount}, #{employeeNo}, #{noticePreNo})
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, notice_date, notice_vote, notice_title, notice_content, notice_hide, viewer_count, employee_no, employee_name, notice_preno FROM notice join employee using(employee_no) ORDER BY notice_date DESC

SELECT notice_no, notice_preno, notice_date, notice_vote, notice_title, notice_content, notice_hide, viewer_count, employee_no, employee_name FROM notice join employee using(employee_no) WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
